Sentencas: A low leakage rate sealant of 10 wt% ZrO2-added CaO-K2O-Na2O-BaO silicate glass for SOFC has been studied.
Titulo: High gas tightness ZrO2-added silicate glass sealant with low thermal stress for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The structure of the sealant is stable at high temperatures with leakage rates less than 10(-4) sccm.cm(-1), and no crystal except for ZrO2 is found in XRD analysis after heating at 800 degrees C for 100 h. ZrO2 is distributed in the glass matrix and plays a supporting role in avoiding over-softening at operating temperature.
Titulo: High gas tightness ZrO2-added silicate glass sealant with low thermal stress for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Good compatibility in both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres between the sealant and SUS430 interconnect was proved by SEM at 750 degrees C for 100 h. A fully coupled 3D Multiphysics button SOFC is constructed for mechanical analyses.
Titulo: High gas tightness ZrO2-added silicate glass sealant with low thermal stress for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the increase of ZrO2 in the sealant will decrease the stress and displacement in the SOFC.
Titulo: High gas tightness ZrO2-added silicate glass sealant with low thermal stress for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Besides, the width of the sealant also affects the stress value and distribution.
Titulo: High gas tightness ZrO2-added silicate glass sealant with low thermal stress for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that GZ10 is a competitive sealing material compared with other ZrO2-added sealants.
Titulo: High gas tightness ZrO2-added silicate glass sealant with low thermal stress for solid oxide fuel cells
